turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to place an order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like four large pizzas, and I'd like two of them to be meat lover pizzas. One could be pepperoni, one cheese, and they need to be gluten-free crust, all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large gluten free pizzas, 2 meat lovers, 1 pepperoni, and 1 cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
